DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there is functional status of a person's liver, the triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the functional status of a person's liver, the triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.:Function; what something is used for.

Concepts.definition: A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.
The normal action performed by a structure or device.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have adequate li
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have adequate liver function?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have adequate liver function?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes, has the patient been definitively treated for 6 months, has no detectable viral load on quantitative PCR and liver function tests (LFTs) meet eligibility requirements?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Do their LFTs meet eligibility requirements?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Adequate function
ReferenceDocuments.description: Adequate hepatic function, as defined below:  Direct bilirubin =< 2.0 mg/dl within 14 days prior to enrollment  ALT/AST =<3 x normal range within 14 days prior to enrollment

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been found to have adequate hepatic function within 28 days prior to randomization? (as defined by protocol section 3.1.10)

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have abnormal LFTs as the sole manifestation of cGVHD?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Eligibility Ind-2 2018257v1 with VD ID # 3506068v1 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2022.10.4 AQT added for ticket request CADSR0001571. ak
